titleStmt.title: Vindiciæ libertatis evangelii, or, A justification for our present indulgence and the acceptance of licences by way of reply to a certain clamourous, anonymous manuscript pamphlet entituled, Queries upon the declaration March 15th 1671/2 : the most usual and considerable arguments against licences are herein examined and satisfied / by a friend to peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: Friend to peace and truth.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
